item.title: After Hearing The Thunderbolts* Plot Twist That Brings The Team Together, I Need To Watch The MCU Movie More Than Ever
item.description: The unlikely team that bands together in Thunderbolts* has been revealed to have an equally unorthodox reason for initially coming together.

item.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Perfect Replacement As The Terminator Is So Obvious, I Can’t Believe It Hasn’t Happened Yet
item.description: For the first time in decades an ideal replacement for Arnold Schwarzenegger's original T-800 is available, so I can't believe they haven't been cast.

item.title: James Cameron Proved Us All Wrong With Avatar 2, And That Makes Jake Sully’s Story In Fire & Ash Even More Exciting
item.description: After Avatar: The Way of Water disproved the franchise's biggest criticism, I'm much more excited about Avatar: Fire & Ash's upcoming story.

item.title: Jonathan Majors Has Pro Bodybuilding Potential, Ronnie Coleman Says After Workout
